## Section 11: Card Component ### 11.1 Component Overview **Description**: A flexible container component with glassmorphic styling, multiple variants, configurable padding and shadows. Primary building block for layouts. **Location**: `src/components/ui/Card.tsx` **When to Use**: - ✅ Content grouping - ✅ Dashboard widgets - ✅ Form sections - ✅ Feature cards - ✅ Transaction/item cards --- ### 11.2 TypeScript Interface ```typescript interface CardProps extends React.HTMLAttributes { /** Visual style variant */ variant?: 'default' | 'glass' | 'gradient' | 'outlined'; /** Internal padding */ padding?: 'none' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl'; /** Drop shadow */ shadow?: 'none' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' | 'glow'; /** Enable hover effect */ hover?: boolean; /** Standard div attributes */ className?: string; children: React.ReactNode; } ``` --- ### 11.3 All Variants #### Variant: Default - Background: `bg-white/10` with `backdrop-blur-lg` - Border: `border border-white/20` - **Most commonly used variant** #### Variant: Glass - Background: `bg-white/5` with `backdrop-blur-xl` - Border: `border border-white/10` - More transparent, stronger blur #### Variant: Gradient - Background: `bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-500/10 to-teal-500/10` - Border: `border border-blue-400/20` - Subtle gradient background #### Variant: Outlined - Background: `bg-transparent` - Border: `border-2 border-white/20` - No background fill --- ### 11.4 Code Examples #### Example 1: Stats Card ```tsx import Card from '@/components/ui/Card'; import { TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react';

Total Revenue

₹12,45,678.00

+12.5% from last month

``` --- #### Example 2: Hover-able Feature Card ```tsx navigate('/features/payments')} >

Payment Gateway

Accept payments from 100+ methods including cards, UPI, net banking, and wallets.

``` --- #### Example 3: Transaction Card ```tsx
Transaction ID: TXN123456 Success
₹15,000.00 UPI Payment
Date 25 Nov 2025, 2:30 PM
Customer Rajesh Kumar
``` --- #### Example 4: Form Section Card ```tsx

Business Information

 ``` --- #### Example 5: Dashboard Widget with Gradient ```tsx
42

Active Settlements

Processing

₹2,45,678 in queue

``` --- #### Example 6: Clickable Card with Full Layout ```tsx navigate('/kyc/upload')} className="cursor-pointer" >

Upload Documents

Upload your business registration and identity documents

``` --- ### 11.5 Padding & Shadow Variations #### Padding Scale ```typescript padding?: 'none' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' // Mapping none: '' // 0rem (0px) sm: 'p-4' // 1rem (16px) md: 'p-6' // 1.5rem (24px) - DEFAULT lg: 'p-8' // 2rem (32px) xl: 'p-10' // 2.5rem (40px) ``` **Usage Guide**: - `none`: Cards with custom internal layout - `sm`: Compact cards, tight spacing - `md`: Standard cards (DEFAULT) - `lg`: Feature cards, emphasis - `xl`: Hero cards, landing pages #### Shadow Scale ```typescript shadow?: 'none' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' | 'glow' // CSS Classes none: '' sm: 'shadow-lg shadow-black/10' md: 'shadow-xl shadow-black/20' // DEFAULT lg: 'shadow-2xl shadow-black/30' xl: 'shadow-2xl shadow-black/40' glow: 'shadow-2xl shadow-blue-500/30' // Special effect ``` **Usage Guide**: - `none`: Flat cards, minimal depth - `sm`: Subtle elevation - `md`: Standard cards (DEFAULT) - `lg`: Elevated cards, overlays - `xl`: Modals, dialogs - `glow`: Special effects, highlights --- ### 11.6 Hover Effects #### Standard Hover ```typescript hover={true} // Applies: // - hover:shadow-2xl hover:shadow-blue-500/20 // - hover:scale-[1.02] // - cursor-pointer // - hover:bg-white/15 ``` #### When to Use Hover - ✅ Clickable cards (navigation) - ✅ Feature cards (interactive) - ✅ Dashboard widgets (clickable) - ❌ Static content cards - ❌ Form section containers - ❌ Read-only information cards --- ### 11.7 Accessibility #### WCAG Compliance - **Contrast**: All text meets WCAG 2.2 AA standards - **Focus Indicators**: Keyboard navigation support via native HTML - **Touch Targets**: Minimum 44x44px for clickable cards - **Screen Readers**: Use semantic HTML structure #### Implementation Checklist ```tsx ✓ Use appropriate semantic HTML inside cards (
,
) ✓ Add aria-label for clickable cards ✓ Ensure focus visible for keyboard navigation ✓ Maintain logical tab order ✓ Provide alt text for images inside cards ``` #### Example: Accessible Clickable Card ```tsx navigate('/feature')} role="button" tabIndex={0} aria-label="Navigate to payment gateway feature" onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && navigate('/feature')} > {/* Card content */} ``` --- ### 11.8 Design Specifications #### Visual Hierarchy 1. **Elevation Layers**: - `glass`: Bottom layer (most subtle) - `default`: Standard layer - `gradient`: Emphasis layer - `outlined`: Flat layer (no depth) 2. **Border Transparency**: - Glass: `border-white/10` (subtle) - Default: `border-white/20` (standard) - Gradient: `border-blue-400/20` (tinted) - Outlined: `border-white/20` (prominent) 3. **Backdrop Blur**: - Glass: `backdrop-blur-xl` (24px blur) - Default: `backdrop-blur-lg` (16px blur) - Gradient: No blur (solid gradient) - Outlined: No blur (transparent) #### Responsive Behavior ```tsx // Mobile: Reduce padding // Tablet/Desktop: Increase padding // Full-width on mobile ``` --- ### 11.9 Atomic Composition **Level**: Molecule (basic component) **Composed Of**: - Design tokens: colors, spacing, shadows, border-radius - Utility classes: `rounded-xl`, `transition-all`, `backdrop-blur-*` **Used In**: - Dashboard (organism): Stats grids, widget layouts - Form layouts (organism): Section containers - Transaction lists (organism): Item cards - Feature cards (organism): Landing page sections **Composition Example**: ```tsx // Card is used to compose Dashboard widgets
{/* More cards... */}
``` --- ### 11.10 Decision Tree ``` Should I use a Card? │ ├─ Need to group related content? │ └─ YES → Use Card │ │ │ ├─ Is it clickable/interactive? │ │ └─ YES → Use hover={true} │ │ │ ├─ What visual style? │ │ ├─ Standard grouping → variant="default" │ │ ├─ Subtle, background → variant="glass" │ │ ├─ Emphasis, highlight → variant="gradient" │ │ └─ Flat, minimal → variant="outlined" │ │ │ ├─ How much content? │ │ ├─ Compact → padding="sm" │ │ ├─ Standard → padding="md" │ │ └─ Spacious → padding="lg" or "xl" │ │ │ └─ How much elevation? │ ├─ Subtle → shadow="sm" │ ├─ Standard → shadow="md" │ ├─ Prominent → shadow="lg" or "xl" │ └─ Special effect → shadow="glow" │ └─ NO → Use plain
or semantic HTML ``` --- ### 11.11 Anti-Patterns ❌ **Nesting Cards Unnecessarily** ```tsx // WRONG

Content

 // CORRECT: Use one card with appropriate variant

Content

 ``` ❌ **Using Cards for Single Lines of Text** ```tsx // WRONG: Overkill for simple text

Hello World

 // CORRECT: Use card for meaningful content groups

User Profile

Name: John Doe

Email: john@example.com

Role: Admin

 ``` ❌ **Mixing Hover with Non-Clickable Cards** ```tsx // WRONG: hover={true} without onClick

Static content

 // CORRECT: Only use hover with interactive cards navigate('/details')}>

Click to view details

 ``` ❌ **Inconsistent Padding Across Similar Cards** ```tsx // WRONG: Different padding for similar purpose ... ... ... // CORRECT: Consistent padding for card grid ... ... ... ``` --- ### 11.12 Related Components - **Button**: Often placed inside cards for actions - **TextField**: Form sections use cards as containers - **Badge**: Status indicators within cards - **Toast**: Similar glassmorphic styling ---
